remarks: Inner product with a zero first argument.  Part of proof of Theorem 6.44 of [Ponnusamy] p. 361.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Feb-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dip0r.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
dip0r.5 $e |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) $.
dip0r.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
dip0l $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z P A ) = 0 ) $.
